channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Give Biden Credit As GDP Report Shows US Has Strongest Economy In The World
item.description: President Joe Biden took a well-earned victory lap for the economy he and his Vice President Kamala Harris have overseen as the economy grew way above expectations at a 2.8% in the second quarter.

item.title: Washington Turns a Blind Eye to Exploited Migrant Children, While their Tormentors Cash In
item.description: On July 17, the Biden-Harris administration’s Department of Justice filed a suit against its largest private housing provider for unaccompanied alien children (UAC) in the United States, alleging that the company, Southwest Key, subjected children to repeated and unwelcome sexual abuse, harassment, rape, solicitation of sex acts, and more. To read the rest of the [...] The post Washington Turns a Blind Eye to Exploited Migrant Children, While their Tormentors Cash In appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Trump Goes On Fox News To Tell His Supporters Not To Vote
item.description: Trump went on Fox News to deliver the message to his supporters that he doesn't need their votes, and they shouldn't show up to vote.

item.title: Kamala Harris Never Consulted with Border Patrol Chiefs Despite Record Illegal Immigration
item.description: In the early months of the Biden administration, Vice President Kamala Harris was tasked with addressing the border crisis by tackling its “root causes.” The results speak for themselves. To read the rest of the article click here The post Kamala Harris Never Consulted with Border Patrol Chiefs Despite Record Illegal Immigration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: The First Kamala Harris Campaign Ad Fits This Moment Perfectly
item.description: With just over 100 days to go, Harris for President released its first official video of the campaign titled “We Choose Freedom," which hits the exact right energy of this moment.

item.title: How Biden’s Border Crisis is Destroying Heartland America: A Look at Springfield, Ohio
item.description: You’ve seen the videos of migrants blatantly violating our immigration laws by illegally crossing the southern border, and you are probably one of the many Americans rightfully horrified by the recent stories of illegal alien crime. To read the rest of the article click here The post How Biden’s Border Crisis is Destroying Heartland America: A Look at Springfield, Ohio appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: FBI Dir Wray Says Trump Could Have Been Struck by Shrapnel Instead of Bullet
item.description: FBI Director Christopher Wray testified that convicted felon and former president Donald Trump could have been struck by shrapnel instead of a bullet.

item.title: Maryland Governor Wes Moore Says No to Statewide Immigration Policy
item.description: In a recent interview, Governor Wes Moore claimed that Maryland cannot establish a policy that dictates how the state interacts with U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) because “it’s a federal agency.” To read the rest of the article click here The post Maryland Governor Wes Moore Says No to Statewide Immigration Policy appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Joe Biden Cements His Legacy Of Greatness In Oval Office Address
item.description: President Biden delivered an Oval Office address that emphasized putting the country ahead of himself and cemented his legacy of presidential greatness.

item.title: DHS Extends Temporary Protected Status to Haitians, Encouraging More Illegal Immigration
item.description: Extending and re-designating TPS to Haitian nationals, at a time of unprecedented illegal immigration to the United States, is yet another example of how the Biden administration’s open-border agenda prioritizes illegal aliens over American citizens. To read the rest of the article click here The post DHS Extends Temporary Protected Status to Haitians, Encouraging More Illegal Immigration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
